name: Native Spirit Productions
address: P.O. Box 23, Benton, WI 53803 (Note: While based in Wisconsin, they perform in Phoenix, Arizona)
description: A cultural entertainment company specializing in musical and cultural dance performances, and artisans. They provide entertainment for various events and are based out of Phoenix, Arizona

name: The Sinquah Family (Indigenous Performers)
address: Hopi villages in Northern Arizona (Specific address not provided, performances are at various venues)
description: A family of Hopi, Tewa, and Choctaw nations known for their mesmerizing Hoop Dance and other traditional dances. They are multiple World Champion Hoop Dance title holders

name: Yellow Bird Productions
description: An internationally renowned cultural presentation company specializing in songs, dances, stories, and dialogue that celebrate American Indian spirit. They are a professional family dance company with many national dance champions

name: Indigenous Enterprise
description: A Phoenix-based dance troupe that promotes and advances Indigenous culture through powwow song and dance, film, and fashion. They have performed globally and were featured in the 2021 virtual inaugural parade

name: Red Mountain Creations
address: Not specified, but performs in the Southwest
description: A family group that educates and shares traditional O'odham/Piipaash dances, songs, and stories, as well as contemporary dances

name: Reise Patrick
address: Salt River Maricopa Indian Community, Arizona (Specific address not provided)
description: Known for demonstrating the Men's Fancy Dance, a highly energetic and colorful dance

name: Moontee Sinquah
address: Hopi/Tewa/Choctaw from Northern Arizona (Specific address not provided)
description: A three-time World Hoop Dance Champion, also a musician and performer

name: Sampson Sixkiller Sinquah
address: Gila River people, Hopi, Tewa, Choctaw and Cherokee nations, grew up in Phoenix, AZ (Specific address not provided)
description: A traditional singer and dancer, specializing in Fancy War, Prairie Chicken, and Hoop dance styles. He is the reigning 2022 World Hoop Dance champion

name: Cody Blackbird
description: A Native American Flutist and three-time World Champion Hoop Dancer

name: Camelback Productions
address: Paradise Valley, Arizona (Specific address not provided)
description: Arizona's first female-owned and South Asian-owned film production and entertainment company, focusing on South Asian storytelling. While not an acrobat business, it represents Native American entrepreneurship in the entertainment sector
